website_summaries.verdict: A cooling experience for your tired feet that can also transform how they look as well.
pros: Described as one of the best nonprescription foot creams available
Customers say that this cream helps severely cracked feet
Does the job in terms of healing all types of foot conditions
cons: Very oily, and it might be too fluid for some

customer_reviews.title: Best in 13 years
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING. The company really needs to market this better to get the word out! I've been struggling with nail fungus for about 13 years, and after using this cream every night for about a month I'm seeing drastic improvement... I mean significantly drastic, which is more than anything else I've ever tried! Plus, the scent is so calming. It's wonderful for helping wind down in the evening. I would highly recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t write reviews, so I thought this product is worth the share!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who has had dry feet for years and one foot is particularly dryer than the other. He has been using this since New Years and has had a remarkable change for the better in just 2 weeks . He has used all sorts of creams, bag Balm ...almost everything! Now both of his feet are completely smooth. Highly recommend this... I started using it this past week and have notice my feet are softer. The fragrance is calming too ~ perfect ritual right before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hagan

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders! It smells good and moisturizes dry, cracked feet completely. It is very oily, so don't use too much. It got rid of the flaking fungus on my feet, and stopped the incessant itching. Use with socks for best result. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Happylark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have had horribly dry, flaky feet recently due to an autoimmune disease. I have tried everything on the market, but nothing worked....until now. This ointment is phenomenal! I slather it on at night, then cover with socks and let it do it's magic while I sleep. My feet no longer hurt and are soft and moisturized. Bring on the sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Kim DeRoest

customer_reviews.title: Love this foot cream
customer_reviews.text: Love this foot cream, burts bees is a wrap! All Natural foot cream is the best their is , I will be re-ordering before it gets low. It even smells great and feels good on the hands as well. Thank You Oran ATL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the purchase. I was looking for something safe for everyday use for my awful running/biking feet and toenails. This has been a big help without making my feet feel like a chemical experiment. Just so you know what you are getting....it is waxy, not creamy so it doesn't go on thick. It also means the tubs last a long time. Also, it is aromatic but not strong. You can smell and feel it putting it on but your co-workers aren't going to smell it like some similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepym

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best ever!
customer_reviews.text: There were a lot of mixed reviews with this product but I decided to give it a try. So glad I did. This stuff is incredible. Smooth and soften tired dry feet, check.... chapped lips fixed overnight, check, dry cuticles, check. any area on your body including your face. It is thick and as you emulsify it between your fingers it gets easily loose and oily. But then you apply to area and it sinks in. No greasy residue.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Consistency of hard vaseline.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as a cream, but much more like thick Vaseline. I expected a creamier spread that would be soothing to my feet. Scent was fine, but I had to dig into the jar to extract ointment and spread it on my feet. Felt very greasy when I put it on at night and I definitely had to wear socks afterwards to not spread it all over the sheets. I have gone back to using prior foot cream, even though more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Banco

customer_reviews.title: OMFG!! Crème de la Crème!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!+! I have had athletes feet and dry, cracked heels and rough feet for years. No amount of lotion, oils worked. It would moisturize but I still had rough feet. I bought this based on the reviews. I must say I've only used it a few days but honeyyyyyyyy....my feet are soft and smooth. I still have the cracked heels but they are less noticeable. Hopefully they will go away all together with more use of the creme. My feet are as smooth as a baby's bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far a great product. As embarrassing as it is I often get athletes foot and my feet get very dry and peel a lot. I’ve only had this product a week and have already seen some great results. Less peeling and much smoother...BUT you must be consistent. Though I feel like consistency is important with a lot of products especially skin products. It also smells great. The only thing I struggle with is I hate wearing socks to bed but it makes sense to do so if you put the cream on before you go to sleep. Def recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: kerrie robberstad

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and amazing! After only a few applications I've seen tremendous ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous and amazing! After only a few applications I've seen tremendous improvement in my foot health. Dry skin is disappearing. Anti fungal properties appreciated. Scent invigorating. Rubbing this cream onto my feet and "socking up" has become a peaceful part of my bedtime routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Cream is has quite a strong aroma which I like and is helping with scaling at heels, it makes feet feel very soft. I also like it for itchy spots on neck & shoulders . The cream is very hard in jar but seems to melt a bit from heat of finger tips when applying. Use @ bedtime as it could make shoes messy or cause slip & be careful of smooth floors or wear socks.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Finally a creme that works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had horrible cracked feet since years. Tried everything under the sun but nothing works. Until I found this creme. After just two weeks my feet are so soft and the cracks are gone. Thank you so much The Yellow Bird
customer_reviews.author: Laura King

customer_reviews.title: I was reluctant to purchase this as I wasn't sure ...
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to purchase this as I wasn't sure it would actually work. I do have to say I am pleasantly surprised. I used it every night after I get out of the shower before bed and apply socks. I have already noticed a difference. I used to have very deep cracks in my heels and my feet were very dry. I can slowly see the cracks are less deep and my heels feel less rough. Im hoping with continued use my feet get back to the way they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after experiencing dry feet with rough calluses. So far it is working great to add moisture to my feet and improve the look and feel of the rough areas. It smells nice, the texture is quite oily but in a good way because my feet soak it up quickly. Would recommend using this product at bedtime so you aren't walking around with oily feet. It's a nice product and i think it will last me a while. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Archuleta

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I saw the great reviews and decided to give it a try. In less than a week my feet are no longer dry and peeling! After years of trying to find a cream that will stop my peeling dry skin I've FINALLY found a product that works. Just a little goes a long way, the product absorbs quickly, is not greasy and has a pleasant scent. I put on socks for about 30 minutes after applying to lock in the moisture. I got out of the shower today, looked at my feet before applying and said wow my feet are normal and soft again! I will be buying some for my family and more for myself. 😊
customer_reviews.author: A. Drew

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Supple
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot cream that I have used. The ingredients are all organic. It has a pleasant texture and smell. I work out daily and worry about get an infection on my feet from the showers. So far, no itchy feet after using this product. In fact, my feet look so fresh that my doctor noticed it and asked me what I was using.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cates

customer_reviews.title: Hard to apply
customer_reviews.text: So I received the “cream” that was anything but cream. The seal on the jar was broken and the product inside was super hard. You had to push your finger into it with force to make the product become cream to apply. So I thought bad seal, must of dried out. So I returned the product and 2 days later got new product. This time the container had air tight seal intact but same hard consistency. It’s not easy to apply at all. You have to man handle the product to get it to where you can apply it. Disappointed but as usual Amazon returned it without question.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: My feet feel Divine!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent foot cream. I really feel its more the consistency of a salve or ointment than a cream/lotion that I had expected. The cream feels greasy when you touch it but it was quickly absorbed into my skin. I applied it for the first time tonight after my shower and my feet feel AMAZING!!! They feel so soft and I can't quit touching them. I am really hoping it works well for foot odor, which was the reason I decided to buy it. So far I really love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen0116

customer_reviews.title: No better than straight coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: Used this product on feet to suppress athlete's foot (didn't expect a cure), and deal with scaly skin and cracks. Was hoping, since it contains tea tree oil, it would work as well without the overpowering scent of the tea tree oil. The scent was mild, but guess it doesn't contain enough tea tree oil to do any good. Sorry, a waste of money. Might just as well use straight coconut oil which does as well to suppress athlete's foot, or tea tree oil which would also work on the scaling if you can stand the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lahore

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY thing that worked for my cracked heals
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after numerous attempts to get rid of my cracked heals with pedicures, pumice stones and a plethora of ointments and creams. Nothing worked until this. I have to admit I was dubious at first because it's a very light cream, but after about a month of (admittedly sporadic) use at night my heals are almost totally healed. Bonus - I I can't stand to wear socks over the ointment but it's so light it soaks in right away and does not leave stains on the sheets. Double bonus: the jar lasts for months! I will definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: KathrynLKH

customer_reviews.title: Truly a miracle product!
customer_reviews.text: At 57, after several foot surgeries, this is beyond wonderful! It is smooth feels like you’re going to the spa for your feet! There is no stickiness whatsoever and the next morning your feet are simply as smooth as a babies bottom. It truly is a miracle product! I have already ordered my second jar and I highly recommend it to anyone who needs treatment for their feet. Being an older kindergarten teacher on my feet all day this is a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FOOT CREAM!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this foot cream! After trying hundreds of foot creams and ointments, finially....I found this. My feet were cracked, painful, calloused. I have used this every night for the past week and my cracks have healed. The calloused skin is softening and the pain in my feet is gone! Thank you so much for this amazing and affordable foot cream. I also used it on my hands and arms too...I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: T. A. P.

customer_reviews.title: Best foot cream I’ve found yet!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t help with my hyperhydrosis, but it helps after the fact with moisturizing my feet, and it’s got a pleasant smell. I spend 14 hours a day in steel toes, and it’s best applied after a shower, and a good pumice scrub. When camping, or hiking, where a shower may be a day or two away, when applied liberally, it helps keep my feet soft, and my shoes from not stinking to high heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Esuoh03

customer_reviews.title: Liked it but it's not a cream
customer_reviews.text: I did like this foot balm, it has a nice scent to it & seemed to keep my feet in somewhat good condition. However, this product is not a cream, but more like hardened coconut oil that melts as you use it and I didn't like the way it felt on my feet, & it didn't seem to really soak in to my feet. It did last me 4-5 months using it multiple times a week. Nice product but probably wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vello

customer_reviews.title: Great heel salve!
customer_reviews.text: Was apprehensive about paying the higher cost, but this salve does the job..... Past use of these types of salves took a long time to see and feel results....this salve worked in three days....ingredients are natural herbs....not the chemical type found in some other ones...
customer_reviews.author: cannabina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing so far on my feet!
customer_reviews.text: I. Love. This. Cream! I have an autoimmune disorder that makes my skin very dry and if I am not very diligent every week about giving myself a pedicure the bottoms of my feet are very dry and cracked and will even split around the heels. I applied this cream for 3 nights before bed and my feet were soft and starting to repair! I‘ve only been using it a short time but I already love it and will continue using it
customer_reviews.author: Macgetticles

customer_reviews.title: This makes my feet feel amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This peppermint foot cream FEELS wonderful! Natural ingredients are important to me so i love that this is natural. It smells great! It does not give that tingly sensation like some muscle balms do. Just smells like peppermint. I put this on my feel after every shower. I massage it in. My usually crocodile feet are feeling nice and soft. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with mild case of athletes foot and this cream (like Vaseline consistency) has been incredible!! My skin was getting so dry and damaged from itching and this has helped stopped that and let the skin heal. I've combined this with the Purely Northwest tea tree foot wash and have been really impressed after using for one week so far. Thank you Yellowbird!
customer_reviews.author: Alexxis Colick

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Foot Cream
customer_reviews.text: I've had cracked and dry feet for years. Sometimes it was painful to walk. I've tried many foot creams over time and none provided me with much relief. I bought Yellow Bird's foot cream and after using it for a few days the results were remarkable. After a few weeks my feet are unrecognizable from the way they've been for so long. I couldn't be happier that I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: One of My Favorite Foot Balms
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several popular foot balms to treat my athlete's foot. This one is my favorite. I like its subtle minty scent and amount of the balm for the price. I use it in conjunction with an antifungal tea tree foot wash and vinegar soak soak (1 part vinegar/ 1 part water). I'll continue with the balm since I'm seeing a better result than in the past.
customer_reviews.author: c_y_k

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied repeat user!  Love that the product is made in USA
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cream for over a year now and it really works. I had dry heels and tried lots of different products and this is the best. I use it daily after showering and my heels are much smoother. It also smells great. I recommend putting on socks after using to help it absorb for awhile. I also love that it is made in the USA as I am leery of some of the products coming from China as I don't trust the list of ingredients they have.
customer_reviews.author: gp

customer_reviews.title: Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and nearly all mentioned dry, cracked feet. So I gave it a shot. It doesn’t work. Maybe I need something stronger but it just doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: mar62

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING!!! It’s not really a cream, more like a salve. It’s oily so you do have to wear socks when you apply it. After using it for about a week my feet are so much softer! It’s actually thinning out the painful calluses I had. And it makes your feet smell GREAT! Will definitely continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Skateboard T

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a very reasonable price. I use it to help with seasonal dry skin on my feet. I apply it at night and in the morning I can feel a noticeable difference in my skin texture.
customer_reviews.author: buffalo4547

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Don't usually write reviews but I had to write how great this product works. It has helped my dry, peeling athletic foot. I am so glad I bought it and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: atno

customer_reviews.title: Seriously shocked 😱😱😱
customer_reviews.text: I have had severe eczema all my life. Joined swim team when I was 12 and caught athletes foot and my feet never recovered. Tough, scale-y, cracked skin that no cream fixed significantly...until I tried this balm! When I tell you I have used this four times sporadically for about 2 months (shower, pumice, balm, fresh socks) and my feet look human again 😱🥰 If you’ve tried everything else to no avail, I suggest you give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie R

customer_reviews.title: good product but didn't work for my feet :(
customer_reviews.text: i really wanted to like this.....it is a great cream, great customer service, fair price...BUT it did not work on my cracked heels....they are not really bad cracks..just very dry and some cracks not super deep....so so so disappointed........ I dn't knw why people are raving about this working on their really bad cracked heels!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zar

customer_reviews.title: Not a cream or lotion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this only to keep my feet softer. The stuff works well, but the texture was a surprise. I was expecting a cream, but it is more like a jar of lip balm. You scrape a little out and massage it on. So it takes a little longer to apply and your foot looks shiny afterwards. It definitely gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ed OB

customer_reviews.title: So I love this product
customer_reviews.text: So I was skeptical but purchased the product anyway - nothing against the seller - but I have really really dry cracked feet with blisters. So I love this product, the itch is gone, the coating on my feet feels good and they are not as dry. I am hoping to see more improved the more I use it. I think it's a bit pricey so that sure I will continue buying.
customer_reviews.author: El W

customer_reviews.title: My feet were in pretty bad shape before foot doctors were scared I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: My feet were in pretty bad shape before foot doctors were scared I bought this stuff because it was natural and I've been using it for a little while and my feet look almost brand new I never thought my feet would ever look like this this is the best product that I've ever came across and I will continue using it trust me this isn't a fake product this is real stuff that really works
customer_reviews.author: Big boy

customer_reviews.title: All Natural Antifungal Foot Cream.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and used it last night. It is a very compressed lotion and not what I had expected, however, I like the fact that you actually can't use "too much" at one time. You glide your finger across the lotion top and then apply that small amount to your foot and repeat & repeat, etc. My feet feel different this morning and I am looking forward to applying this once again, tonight.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mellott

customer_reviews.title: Happiness In A Jar!😂🙏
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This product is the BEST! I’m a normal customer who decided to try this product! The results are astounding! I do not like the scent to much, but for the results I’ll take it (eucalyptus) I use it on my elbows! My neck! And of course my feet! Just try it! Just try! I’m sorta middle aged! My neck, I’m truly satisfied and happy that I purchased the product! YES!
customer_reviews.author: Bzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: So far we love this balm
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this balm! After a few uses my feet feel softer and my husband's athlete's foot is drying up. This is a rich balm, not a creamy lotion (in case that's what you're looking for). I make sure I put it on when I can sit and let it soak in for a few minutes or put socks on right away. I love the cool tingle of the peppermint. I am sure I will be buying this as long as it's available!
customer_reviews.author: S&J

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, I’d recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cream. I have very sensitive skin, and mixed with a sweat glad condition I have a lot of problems with sweat rashes and raw skin. This doesn’t burn when I apply it. It doesn’t smell like chemicals. It doesn’t clog the pores on my feet and cause further sweat problems. A little bit goes a long way. I’ve been using it nightly for two weeks, as well as on problem areas throughout the day, and I’ve seen a significant improvement in skin health on my feet. It started softening and soothing my raw skin the first night. I’m very happy with it and will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad but it's not a soft cream.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see that it is not really a soft cream, so it is not so easy to apply. It seems to do a good job and smells nice. It is hard and I have to keep rubbing it to get any on my fingers to apply. It states to apply generously but that's not all that easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mohaco

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this as part of my new foot are regiment has made my feet soft and supple again, after decades of neglect. That said, it is rather thick and goopy, and has a strong aroma that I don’t particularly enjoy. The results are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Saint-John Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Healed my athlete's foot
customer_reviews.text: After much research I ordered this and was not disappointed. My feet feel so comfortable now that I apply this before putting on socks every day. Also, I'm sensitive to the smell of many essential oils, but the scent of this product did not bother me. A+!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Fitzhenry

customer_reviews.title: Better as body moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with keep my feet moisturizer. However, it does not do much to keep them moisturize. I do like the lavender scent and I usually use it all over my body and a moisturizer, and it helps more for the rest of my body than my feet.
customer_reviews.author: martm

customer_reviews.title: Not a cream!
customer_reviews.text: This is more like a wax/oil. Kind of like burts bees but for your feet. Do not like oily feeling left on feet. Also, description says its "organic" and it is not. There is no USDA organic marking anywhere on the container.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: its like pomade for the feet
customer_reviews.text: first of all this stuff smells amazing, kinda peppermint eucalyptus. its got a a pomade conistency, a bit oily but oil is good for the skin and feet. can even use it on your hands and cuticles. makes my rough feet skin super smooth and replenished/hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Three days ago I could barely walk because my bottom heel was peeling, cracked, and bleeding. It was so painful. Today, I can barely see the area on one foot and the other foot is healing up has stopped peeling and bleeding. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: WDLN

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it's all natural and antifungal
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of products to improve the appearance of my rough dry feet. All of them fell short of my expectations...until I purchased this foot cream. I noticed an improvement after just one application and the product continues to deliver. It is a bit greasy so I usually put on a pair of cotton socks but the results are worth it. I like the fact that it's all natural and antifungal. Kudos to Yellow Bird foot cream...you have a repeat customer in me!
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly don’t ever usually write reviews even when I love the product. But this is amazing! Thinking I want to rub it on my face ( obviously won’t ) but maybe lol Smells great! And works wonders on my feet and I have tried so many lotions. Picked This just because I ran out of my other lotions and read the reviews and so glad I did. But really this company should make a face lotion or serum!! Or just more skincare products because I’m sold!
customer_reviews.author: Nadie nod

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is literally magic
customer_reviews.text: Okay (wife here).... I have to write a review on this foot cream. It is literally magic. Keep in mind it takes several weeks to fully work but it WORKS. Combine it with a foot scrubbing every few days, lather it on and wear socks for a few hours every day and you will be amazed what this stuff does. I also put this on at night with no socks as well. I was so embarrassed of my feet to the point that I was going to see a podiatrist. I’m so happy I gave this a try first. Give it a chance. It literally does everything it says on the container.
customer_reviews.author: Brian n.

customer_reviews.title: Try this as your first option. A standard to beat
customer_reviews.text: Years of hard use and abuse working in steel toes and my feet show the abuse. Pain and dry sore skin are daily issues, but this cream really worked. The scent is distinct but not unpleasant and smells of only natural materials, no chemical smells.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product Great for Eczema
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I have a very pregnant relative that has always suffered from eczema and it has really flared up and for the first time all over her feet. We have been creating our own version using a lanolin thick cream adding our food grade essential oils using peppermint, tea tree, lavender and eucalyptus. So when I saw this I bought it to rub on her feet last night. I will say I thought the price was to high for 4 ounces. However, I believe since this seems to be an ointment it worked and she said last night her feet felt wonderful. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: pt

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter feet (& beyond!)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend who always suffers from dry feet. He's tried every type of medicated cream and they help but never solve the issue (plus they're $$$). Based on reviews, I decided to try this and found it is very effective and smells great (very strong lavender)! I love stealing it for myself as a moisturizer and have bought it for others as a gift as well! Definitely recommend for super soft feet or as a supplement to any ointment you use to treat issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Donovan

customer_reviews.title: My feet love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for two weeks now. I have peripheral neuropathy and toenail fungus. The product has softened the skin and callouses on my feet. I can feel the tingling in my feet. Toe nail fungus is subsiding. Smells and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E. Hamling

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! I get very dry cracked feet and this stuff works amazing. It’s definitely not a cream though, it’s more of a wax/balm. Very greasy, but if you leave you feet up for a while, it’s works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: AnnieRocks

customer_reviews.title: This foot cream did not do anything
customer_reviews.text: The packing is good the scent okay but it does nothing for our feet, it does not softens, does not hydrates, it is not cooling. We used it and rubbed well, and a little later the feet felt like they got nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Audry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried over the counter drugs and many remedies for toenail fungus and just rough skin on the bottom of the foot. This stuff is amazing. Started making a difference in a few days. I put it on at night before bed. Some days I put it on and wear it all day since my feet are covered with socks. Safe, natural product that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: country girl

customer_reviews.title: It works but it's not a solution
customer_reviews.text: This is a great everyday foot cream, but it won't fix a real problem. I used this cream for over a year and it definitely softened the skin on my feet and kept the athletes foot fungus down. I finally visited a doctor and got a prescription oral antifungal which solved my problem in three months. I continue to use this cream to keep my feet soft.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walk

customer_reviews.title: Also works on hands and nails
customer_reviews.text: The best smelling skin product on the market. It works great not only for feet but also hands, nails and elbows. Only drawback is that it goes fast. When it comes to feet you have to use quite a bit to get the desired results. I use it on my weather battered hands
customer_reviews.author: Anuta

customer_reviews.title: Best foot cream for severely dry, cracked feet
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for two days but I already see an improvement. I have always had dry feet and heels and nothing seemed to help until now. If you habe dry, peel feet, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot Cream
customer_reviews.text: I used to suffer from severe cracked dry heels they would be so bad that they would bleed and it would hurt to walk. I tried this foot cream among others and by far this is the best foot cream that I have found and I love the natural non-toxic ingredients. It has healed my feet and now they're soft and beautiful very happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Foot Fungal Cream
customer_reviews.text: A good foot cream to help reduce dryness and fungal problems. It has a pleasant smell without being overbearing. Not greasley and helps keep the feet from cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Morlock

customer_reviews.title: Works AND smells good - a winning combination
customer_reviews.text: Many times foot creams have an unpleasant underlying odor. This cream is thick and creamy and yet smells good. I put it on at night (with socks over) and it really helps with dry, cracked skin.
customer_reviews.author: AlkiFamily

customer_reviews.title: Not these best
customer_reviews.text: I have no feeling in my toes, I was hoping this would help with the skin on my feet, since I can't feel my feet are bad or if I hurt myself, I rely on creams to help with the cracking, but for some reason, it actually hurt the part of the feet I can feel
customer_reviews.author: MZD2UTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Bengay, but works like MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, I am happy with it, but I do not like the smell, but it is working and that is all I care about. The dryness is gone and my feet are soft again. There were so dry all the time almost like they were literally rotting, like foot rot, for no good reason, and now they are smooth and normal after only a few days, cleared right up, Thank You so much!!! 4 stars for the smell
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: smells and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It smells wonderful. I really love the consistency of it as well. I have never used a foot lotion or moisturizer before so I was worried I wouldn't like the way if felt but this is not greasy at all. I use it with socks and I can feel it's there but it doesnt make my feet feel wet or gross. It also seems like it will last quite a while but I will definitely be getting more once I'm out. Thank you yellow bird for making such a great natural product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far.
customer_reviews.text: Ive only had this product for about a week. So far I can see a real difference in my athletes foot. Skin is not cracking as much. I'm hoping that the redness will fade soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D

customer_reviews.title: Oily, melting cream that works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot cream I’ve ever used. It’s oily, so I slathered it on and walked around in socks until the next day, but two weeks later, my feet are still ridiculously soft. I wish they had a gallon bottle of it 😂
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Black

customer_reviews.title: There WAS a fungus among us
customer_reviews.text: My son has battle athlete’s foot for two years. (Which is ironic because he’s not even that great at sports). I’ve tried every product imaginable and had to cash in my Roth IRA to pay for all essential oils I tried. Finding this was a God send. The itch has gone away, no more cracked skin around his toes, and he’s added at least ten yards to his drive. So, if high moisturizing fungal cream is what you desire, then this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY THING THAT HAS WORKED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with Athletes foot... I have very sweaty feet... TMI I know. This is the only product I have EVER used that got rid of the athletes foot. It’s compelled rejuvenated my feet... my shoes don’t carry any smell anymore and I’ll definitely be reccomending this product.
customer_reviews.author: sara o.

customer_reviews.title: My feet feel so much better now
customer_reviews.text: This Moisturizer seems to be doing the trick on my feet :) It’s been a week now I believe and I put it on twice a day so I’m gonna have to be ordering some more soon LOL but my feet seem to be doing a lot better because they were so dry I didn’t take any pictures because I was embarrassed :( But my feet are just so dry and ashy and white and it was very embarrassing right now they feel soft and smooth and not the way they were before this product
customer_reviews.author: vivian barillas

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell but I haven’t noticed any great results even with habitual use before bed. I have athletes foot, toenail fungus & cracked heels. Nothing has improved with using this. I thought maybe the dry heels might get a bit better, nope.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Andersen

customer_reviews.title: although it does smell nice. That being said
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing for me, although it does smell nice. That being said, I still woke up in the middle of the night because my hands and feet were so dry and itchy. Went back to vaseline. Sorry, yellow bird, this was a fail for me.
customer_reviews.author: APL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, but be careful around cats!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved using this foot cream, and it really softened up my feet. However, I do have to double up on thick socks because the tea tree oil in the cream is poisonous to my cats, but I do understand it has wonderful antibacterial properties. This is a great product just be extra cautious around your animals!
customer_reviews.author: Ben P.

customer_reviews.title: Cools and Calms hot itchy feet!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice "end of day" foot ointment for anyone with mild irritation athletes foot. Feels great, smells nice, cools and calms the hot/itchy feeling at the end of your day.... Lasted about 4-6 months, I recently re-ordered. I think I'm a convert!
customer_reviews.author: Still Shopping

customer_reviews.title: My Athlete's Foot Is GONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Your Antifungal Foot Cream has taken care of my athlete's foot problem in merely one week. I am going to tell my family and friends that your product is the one to buy. I am so grateful, thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: M.D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: No s#!t, it really works!
customer_reviews.text: After one use (per 30 minute rub in massage-per foot) my husband's decade long, severe athletes foot has finally showed a significant change. Even the fungus color has depleted, and no new cracks were found. I followed the treatment with hypoallergenic lotion and the pair seems to be magical. I don't know what you have attempted before this product, but I believe your will find relief in this just as we are, with this struggle. There is a light at the end of the tunnel!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for all around foot care!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. For years my husband has been looking for a product for dry, cracked feet and a product for fungal infections, but with no success. Now, this product takes care of both! His feet have not looked and felt so great in years! We are repeat buyers. Thank you, yellow bird!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Carle

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it. I thought it would be an actual cream you rub into your skin. This is like rubbing Vaseline on your skin. Very greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Since this product is Petroleum based it is extremely slick and gets everywhere. My feet didn't seem any different, even after using once a day for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Nicho

customer_reviews.title: Nightly
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my feet at night and in the morning. The smell is very pleasing, and my feet are thanking me for it.
customer_reviews.author: Milwaukee Cat Man

customer_reviews.title: Moisture and Anti-fungal
customer_reviews.text: This jar lasted me about 8 months of daily use on my feet before putting socks on for the day. This is the first summer in years that I did not get any sort of fungus on my feet. I am a petite girly girl and was looking for a natural product that would provide both moisture and anti-fungal protection. This did the job and smells redreshing (minty/menthol).
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: It works very well on any rash.
customer_reviews.text: I used this cream for stress rashes or eczema in the folds of my arms. Nothing else worked but this cream! Smells nice, it feels soothing and it made my skin stronger because it had become weak from so much scratching. I also used it as a protected for my babies diaper area. Really this is a wonderful product that can be used for any skin issue I've discovered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cream!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this foot cream. Initially bought it to protect my feet from athlete's foot, since I was worried about contracting it at yoga class. The cream feels smooth and calming, and not moist like other foot creams. I apply it before I go to bed. Smells good but not strong and perfumey like other creams. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin

customer_reviews.title: Really helps feet be less dry and more smooth.
customer_reviews.text: It is very moisturizing. I always put it on my hands also after rubbing it on my feet. I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Layne

customer_reviews.title: Fast working and effective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this preparation to help heal my neglected feet, and it's doing just that in a hurry. After only a week the skin looks and feels a lot better than I would have expected. It has a nice, unobtrusive fragrance and it feels very soothing on the skin. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: John Radway

customer_reviews.title: This is a regular purchase for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: This is a regular purchase for my husband.He has diabetes with some neuropathy. He states this works the best for him I will continue ordering it ,it does that well.
customer_reviews.author: Evan or Nancy Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Long Term Product
customer_reviews.text: Used nightly this improved my husbands skin on his feet. Once he stopped using it, his callouses came back. He became tired of having to use it every night/sleepiing in socks. He would rather go and get pedicures every few months.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful that this will work-already seeing improvements
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cream, along with their tea tree scrub with a nail brush, for about a week. I already notice an improvement in both my toenails and a reduction in athletes foot. I just got the foot soak (also nice) but I've only used it once. Hopeful that this will clear up my fungal issues.
customer_reviews.author: Goldnotsilver

customer_reviews.title: ... first I didn't think this foot cream was so great but I have warmed to it
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't think this foot cream was so great but I have warmed to it. It doesn't glide on very easily but I am assuming that is due to the more natural side of it. It has a gently pleasant smell and of course it's great to know that it has antifungal properties when treating clients feet.
customer_reviews.author: MWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Yoga confidence
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! I’m no longer ashamed of my feet in yoga class. They’re softer and my nails look great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Ingrediants
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Its been 3 weeks since i got it and my heels have no cracks anymore. I use it everytime after shower. I am a nurse and i wear shoes 8+ hrs a day which made my heels dry especially in summer time. I was hesitant at first but I wanted to buy something that has natural ingrediants and this product have 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Theodhora Olloni

customer_reviews.title: Great Foot Cream, Not Much in Container, Poor Delivery Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great foot cream. The best I've ever found. The container was only half full and therefore I think it is overpriced. The Amazon delivery service was bizarre; the delivery person apparently didn't want to get out of the car and just threw the package into the yard; I found it leaning against a tree. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B

customer_reviews.title: It’s legit
customer_reviews.text: This product actually does what it says. My feet are always feeling dry in the summer months. I’ve been using this at night with socks, and it has made a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Burcham

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and hydrates my feet. It is not oily and has helped keep my feet smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Softball17Mom

product_meta.title: All Natural Antifungal Foot Cream. Moisturizing Organic Relief for Dry Cracked Heels, Callused Feet, Athletes Foot. Best Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils: Peppermint, Lavender, Eucalyptus, Tea Tree.
product_meta.description:
Because beauty is more than skin deep… 

Your skin acts as a sponge so why not massage your feet with the very best natural ingredients that will make them look great? Our foot cream has been specially formulated with only 10 simple organic and natural ingredients that are known to provide the most effective and soothing relief. 

Ingredients: (Soy, Gluten, GMO Free) 

-Virgin Organic Coconut Oil 
-Shea Butter 
-Beeswax 
-Organic High Oleic Sunflower Oil 
-Tapioca Starch 
-Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils (Peppermint, Lavender, Tea Tree, Eucalyptus) 
-Rosemary Extract 

Buy now Risk Free. Made in the USA. Made in Small Batches. We want you to love this product as much as we do. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase simply contact us for a full refund. No questions asked.
feature_bullets: TOTAL FOOT CARE- Everything you need to keep your feet healthy and looking great. Hydrates and locks in moisture to treat cracked heels and rough calluses while anti-fungal, antibacterial, and anti-inflammatory essential oils provide soothing relief from odor and athlete's foot.

ALL NATURAL- Contains 10 simple organic and natural ingredients. Includes therapeutic grade essential oils of Peppermint, Lavender, Eucalyptus, and Tea Tree. With only the best ingredients no sacrifices are made! Paraben free, Phthalate free, Soy free, GMO free, and Gluten free.

LONG LASTING COVERAGE – Unlike other foot creams and foot lotions our thick and concentrated formula provides long lasting support. Its unique balm like properties provides additional time for your feet to soak up its nourishing ingredients.

REJUVENATING- Massage your sore feet with this natural foot cream remedy and you’ll feel like you’ve just left the spa. This humectant moisturizer promotes blood circulation, eliminates stinky odor, and provides a gentle soothing sensation that’s perfect for cooling achy feet or providing relief from itchy chapped skin.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE- Use Risk Free! If you're unhappy with our all natural foot cream for any reason let us know and we'll provide you with a full refund.
